name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-product-support
title: Product support declararative agent
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a product support agent using Microsoft 365 Copilot.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a product support agent using Microsoft 365 Copilot. The agent can answer questions about products using content stored in Microsoft 365.

thumbnails.alt: Demonstration of the Product Support agent
